attributes.action: prohibit the nationalisation of private firms (i.e. Northern Rock, Rail Track etc).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The nationalisation of private firms has significant cost in terms of the damage to share holder capital, taxation on individuals and distortion of market forces.  Nationalised firms are generally more costly to administrate and are less customer focused than private firms.  They create an incentive for government to create a monopoly through legislation.
